message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still a bit higher than $10,000.  How about $11,000? That's still a great deal for you, and it's closer to my ideal price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your latest offer. I'm willing to go up to $10,500 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle.
